Judul: OPTIMASI PRODUKSI PADA RESERVOIR GAS MULTILAYERED BERDASAR NODAL ANALYSIS MENGGUNAKAN DOWNHOLE CONTROL VALVES
Abstrak: Multilayered gas well production is seen commonly on active gas field. Physical characteristic differences between layers rose a challenge of production optimization for each layer by avoiding the fluid transportation between layers phenomena which generally called the crossflow phenomena. A case study is done for a multilayered gas well with different physical characteristics to identify the appearance of the crossflow phenomena on the optimum production operation point based on nodal analysis methods to then optimization possibilities are discussed using the Downhole Interval Control Valves (ICVs) tool. The result of this study suggests review of currently producing multilayered gas wells.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Prof. Ir. Taufan Marhaendrajana, M.Sc., Ph.D.
Kata Kunci: multiayered gas well production, crossflow, nodal analysis, ICVs tool
